description.value:
You pray to Handrich to bless a transaction, binding all parties to their agreements. To break any deal blessed by Bought Loyalty, a target must first pass a Hard (-20) Willpower Test. If they fail, they must do everything in their power to ensure that they fulfil their part of the bargain. If a character does manage to break the deal, they suffer a -10 penalty to all Tests, and a non-cumulative -20 penalty to all Charm, Evaluate, and Haggle Tests, until a week after the next Marktag. You are immediately aware of anyone who breaks their deal. 

This Miracle is not bound by typical Miracles Limitations (Core Book, page 217), may be enacted as many times as you wish and does not prevent other Miracles from being used.
